Original:

Original:
身為一名酒精愛好者，平常最愛就是下班後跑不同的酒吧，最近發現家附近開了這家新店，今天下班就約朋友來喝幾杯。

聽老闆說這邊其實是水煙酒吧，不僅有調酒、特色啤酒、滷味，還有水煙可以抽！我們抱着嚐鮮的心態點了一壺，結果一抽就整個愛上😆配上好幾杯特調，躺在沙發上真的蠻爽的，會是想要揪朋友來的小天地😻

可惜我們今天太飽沒吃到滷味（點暢飲直接猛喝好幾杯…）但聽旁邊客人說很好吃，下次再來試！

也謝謝熱情老闆們的招待，今天真的玩得很開心🥹✨不然平常都不太想要評論的
EN:
As a alcohol enthusiast, the most favorite is to run different bars after get off work. Recently, I found that this new store was opened near the home.

Listening to the boss said that this is actually a water cigarette bar, not only alcoholic, special beer, braised, but also water smoke to smoke!We ordered a pot with an early -minded mentality. As a result, we fell in love with several cups of special tunes as soon as we were drawn. Lying on the sofa is really cool.

Unfortunately, we are too full today and we haven't eaten Lifi (drink a few drinks directly to drink directly ...) But listening to the guests next to me saying that it is delicious. Let ’s try it next time!

Thank you for your hospitality for the enthusiastic bosses. Today I really have fun. Otherwise, I usually don’t want to comment.
